commands.name: az csvmware resource-pool list
commands.summary: List details of resource pools in a private cloud.
examples: az csvmware resource-pool list -p MyPrivateCloud --location eastus

commands.name: az csvmware resource-pool show
commands.summary: Get the details of a resource pool in a private cloud.
examples: az csvmware resource-pool show -n MyResourcePool -p MyPrivateCloud --location eastus
